inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed, locally confined adenocarcinoma of the prostate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Combined Gleason score 6 or less, with no individual Gleason score of 4 or 5
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient has decided to undergo brachytherapy at the Johns Hopkins Hospital as treatment choice for his prostate cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prostate volume by TRUS less than 50 cc
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: International Prostate symptom score must be 18 or less
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed study-specific consent form prior to registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical or Pathological Lymph node involvement,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Radical surgery for carcinoma of the prostate
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous transurethral resection of the prostate
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous or concurrent cancers other than basal or squamous cell skin cancers unless disease free for at least 5 years.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Major medical or psychiatric illness which, in the investigator's opinion, Hip prosthesis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP. He has decided to undergo brachytherapy at Johns Hopkins Hospital.
